title: 93x28: Eligibility to Serve as a Fiduciary of a Blind Trust
summary: Under 5 C.F.R § 2634.406(a)(2), eligibility to serve as a fiduciary of a qualified trust is limited to financial institutions, not more than 10 percent of which are owned or controlled by a single individual.  The regulation fully conforms to 5 U.S.C. app. § 102(f).
